name: 【Anime&Realistic】Elegant Kimono 和服
description:
This LORA can generate elegant kimono, I've always wanted to dress my favorite anime characters in beautiful kimonos, so I made it.

trigger words: (yellow/blue/green/white/black/red/pink kimono), (japanese clothes), (floral print), (long sleeves)

lora's weight: 0.5~0.7

Mitsuha and Hina in the example imgs were made by me as well, welcome to download:

https://civitai.com/models/72096/three-heroines-of-makoto-shinkai-disaster-movie-series

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

和服lora，可以生成好看的和服，一大功能就是为你喜欢的动漫角色换衣服（角色LORA必须支持换衣），也是我制作它的初衷。当然，也可以用于真人模型，比如chilloutmix和majic

触发词: (yellow/blue/green/white/black/red/pink kimono), (japanese clothes), (floral print), (long sleeves)

lora 权重: 0.5~0.7

例图里的三叶和阳菜也是我的LORA，欢迎下载：

https://civitai.com/models/72096/three-heroines-of-makoto-shinkai-disaster-movie-series
